title: At the Railway Station

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of oil on panel.

publication_history:

provenance_text: Albert A. Munger (died 1898), Chicago; on loan to the Art Institute from 1890 [see Chicago Daily Tribune 1890]; bequeathed to the Art Institute, 1901.
